FuncDef: This command specifies an existing managed SAP policy. Managed SAPs allow the use of policies and a SAP template for the creation of a SAP. Managed SAP policies are created in theconfig>subscr-mgmtcontext. This command is only applicable to SAPs created as a capture-sap.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing managed SAP policy name up to 32 characters in length.
